dcterms:creator: U-V Marti
Horst Bunke
dcterms:description: The IAM dataset consists of English handwritten texts contributed by 657 writers, making a total of 1,539 handwritten pages consisting of 115,320 segmented words. The data is labeled at the sentence, line, and word level.
dcterms:title: IAM dataset

dcterms:description: The Aachen splits provide train, test, and validation data for the IAM dataset, ensuring that the writer sets are disjoint, meaning writers seen during training are not seen during testing.
dcterms:title: Aachen splits
